Habitat connectivity engine

Internal function. Servesa s a wrapper around the habitat connectivity engine developed in C++.

.habConnEngine(cost, patches)

Arguments

cost

Numeric raster cost (resistance) map.
patches

Logical raster indicating presence of habitat patches.

Value

An object of class hce.

See also

link{habConnRcpp}

Examples

library(raster)

cost <- raster(system.file("extdata/fragmented.asc", package = "grainscape"))
plot(cost)

# cells in raster `cost` with value of 1 are habitat (patch) cells
links <- grainscape:::.habConnEngine(cost, patches = (cost == 1))

links                  # examine the object
